verses.verse: וְאָ֣הַבְתָּ֔ <WH157> Therefore thou shalt love אֵ֖ת <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> thy God וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֣ <WH8104> and keep מִשְׁמַרְתּ֗וֹ <WH4931> his charge וְחֻקֹּתָ֧יו <WH2708> and his statutes וּמִשְׁפָּטָ֛יו <WH4941> and his judgments וּמִצְוֹתָ֖יו <WH4687> and his commandments כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner הַיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> alway

וִֽידַעְתֶּם֮ <WH3045> And know הַיּוֹם֒ <WH3117> ye this day כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for לֹ֣א <WH3808> not אֶת־ <WH854> for בְּנֵיכֶ֗ם <WH1121> for [I speak] not with your children אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not יָדְעוּ֙ <WH3045> which have not known וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> and who לֹא־ <WH3808> have not רָא֔וּ <WH7200> and which have not seen אֶת־ <WH853> מוּסַ֖ר <WH4148> the chastisement יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <WH430> your God אֶת־ <WH853> גָּדְל֕וֹ <WH1433> his greatness אֶת־ <WH853> יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> hand הַחֲזָקָ֔ה <WH2389> his mighty וּזְרֹע֖וֹ <WH2220> arm הַנְּטוּיָֽה׃ <WH5186> and his stretched out

וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֹֽתֹתָיו֙ <WH226> And his miracles וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> מַעֲשָׂ֔יו <WH4639> and his acts אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> which he did בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt לְפַרְעֹ֥ה <WH6547> unto Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> all אַרְצֽוֹ׃ <WH776> and unto all his land

וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> and what עָשָׂה֩ <WH6213> And what he did לְחֵ֨יל <WH2428> unto the army מִצְרַ֜יִם <WH4714> of Egypt לְסוּסָ֣יו <WH5483> unto their horses וּלְרִכְבּ֗וֹ <WH7393> and to their chariots אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> when הֵצִ֜יף <WH6687> to overflow אֶת־ <WH853> מֵ֤י <WH4325> how he made the water יַם־ <WH3220> sea סוּף֙ <WH5488> of the Red עַל־ <WH5921> and פְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6440> them בְּרָדְפָ֖ם <WH7291> as they pursued אַחֲרֵיכֶ֑ם <WH310> after וַיְאַבְּדֵ֣ם <WH6> hath destroyed יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> you and [how] the LORD עַ֖ד <WH5704> this הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> them unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> he

וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> and what עָשָׂ֛ה <WH6213> And what he did לָכֶ֖ם בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> unto you in the wilderness עַד־ <WH5704> until בֹּאֲכֶ֖ם <WH935> until ye came עַד־ <WH5704> until הַמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> into this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this

וַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> and what עָשָׂ֜ה <WH6213> And what he did לְדָתָ֣ן <WH1885> unto Dathan וְלַאֲבִירָ֗ם <WH48> and Abiram בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the sons אֱלִיאָב֮ <WH446> of Eliab בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son רְאוּבֵן֒ <WH7205> of Reuben אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> and what פָּצְתָ֤ה <WH6475> opened הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> how the earth אֶת־ <WH853> פִּ֔יהָ <WH6310> her mouth וַתִּבְלָעֵ֥ם <WH1104> and swallowed them up וְאֶת־ <WH853> בָּתֵּיהֶ֖ם <WH1004> and their households וְאֶת־ <WH853> אָהֳלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH168> and their tents וְאֵ֤ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and every הַיְקוּם֙ <WH3351> and all the substance אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> and what בְּרַגְלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH7272> that [was] in their possession בְּקֶ֖רֶב <WH7130> in the midst כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of all Israel

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for עֵֽינֵיכֶם֙ <WH5869> But your eyes הָֽרֹאֹ֔ת <WH7200> have seen אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> acts יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD הַגָּדֹ֑ל <WH1419> all the great אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which עָשָֽׂה׃ <WH6213> which he did

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּם֙ <WH8104> Therefore shall ye keep אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> every הַמִּצְוָ֔ה <WH4687> all the commandments אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <WH6680> I command הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> you this day לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> so תֶּחֶזְק֗וּ <WH2388> that ye may be strong וּבָאתֶם֙ <WH935> and go in וִֽירִשְׁתֶּ֣ם <WH3423> and possess אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אַתֶּ֛ם <WH859> you עֹבְרִ֥ים <WH5674> whither ye go שָׁ֖מָּה <WH8033> in it לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <WH3423> to possess

וּלְמַ֨עַן <WH4616> that תַּאֲרִ֤יכוּ <WH748> And that ye may prolong יָמִים֙ <WH3117> [your] days עַל־ <WH5921> on הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> in the land אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּ֨ע <WH7650> sware יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> which the LORD לַאֲבֹתֵיכֶ֛ם <WH1> unto your fathers לָתֵ֥ת <WH5414> to give לָהֶ֖ם וּלְזַרְעָ֑ם <WH2233> unto them and to their seed אֶ֛רֶץ <WH776> a land זָבַ֥ת <WH2100> that floweth חָלָ֖ב <WH2461> with milk וּדְבָֽשׁ׃ <WH1706> and honey ס

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> For the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> you בָא־ <WH935> whither thou goest in שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <WH8033> in it לְרִשְׁתָּ֔הּ <WH3423> to possess לֹ֣א <WH3808> like כְאֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> it [is] not as the land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> of Egypt הִ֔וא <WH1931> he אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which יְצָאתֶ֖ם <WH3318> from whence ye came out מִשָּׁ֑ם <WH8033> in it אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> where תִּזְרַע֙ <WH2232> where thou sowedst אֶֽת־ <WH853> זַרְעֲךָ֔ <WH2233> thy seed וְהִשְׁקִ֥יתָ <WH8248> and wateredst בְרַגְלְךָ֖ <WH7272> [it] with thy foot כְּגַ֥ן <WH1588> as a garden הַיָּרָֽק׃ <WH3419> of herbs

וְהָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> But the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which אַתֶּ֜ם <WH859> you עֹבְרִ֥ים <WH935> abide שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <WH8033> in it לְרִשְׁתָּ֔הּ <WH3423> to possess אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> it [is] a land הָרִ֖ים <WH2022> of hills וּבְקָעֹ֑ת <WH1237> and valleys לִמְטַ֥ר <WH4306> of the rain הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> of heaven תִּשְׁתֶּה־ <WH8354> [and] drinketh מָּֽיִם׃ <WH4325> water

אֶ֕רֶץ <WH776> A land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God דֹּרֵ֣שׁ <WH1875> careth for אֹתָ֑הּ <WH853> תָּמִ֗יד <WH8548> [are] always עֵינֵ֨י <WH5869> the eyes יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God בָּ֔הּ מֵֽרֵשִׁית֙ <WH7225> upon it from the beginning הַשָּׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> of the year וְעַ֖ד <WH5704> even אַחֲרִ֥ית <WH319> even unto the end שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> of the year ס

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> shall come אִם־ <WH518> if שָׁמֹ֤עַ <WH8085> And it shall come to pass if ye shall hearken תִּשְׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> diligently אֶל־ <WH413> to מִצְוֹתַ֔י <WH4687> unto my commandments אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֛י <WH595> I מְצַוֶּ֥ה <WH6680> which I command אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> you this day לְאַהֲבָ֞ה <WH157> to love אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶם֙ <WH430> your God וּלְעָבְד֔וֹ <WH5647> and to serve בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all לְבַבְכֶ֖ם <WH3824> him with all your heart וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> and all נַפְשְׁכֶֽם׃ <WH5315> and with all your soul

וְנָתַתִּ֧י <WH5414> That I will give מְטַֽר־ <WH4306> [you] the rain אַרְצְכֶ֛ם <WH776> of your land בְּעִתּ֖וֹ <WH6256> in his due season יוֹרֶ֣ה <WH3138> the first rain וּמַלְק֑וֹשׁ <WH4456> and the latter rain וְאָסַפְתָּ֣ <WH622> that thou mayest gather דְגָנֶ֔ךָ <WH1715> in thy corn וְתִֽירֹשְׁךָ֖ <WH8492> and thy wine וְיִצְהָרֶֽךָ׃ <WH3323> and thine oil

וְנָתַתִּ֛י <WH5414> And I will send עֵ֥שֶׂב <WH6212> grass בְּשָׂדְךָ֖ <WH7704> in thy fields לִבְהֶמְתֶּ֑ךָ <WH929> for thy cattle וְאָכַלְתָּ֖ <WH398> that thou mayest eat וְשָׂבָֽעְתָּ׃ <WH7646> and be full

הִשָּֽׁמְר֣וּ <WH8104> Take heed לָכֶ֔ם פֶּ֥ן <WH6435> are not יִפְתֶּ֖ה <WH6601> be not deceived לְבַבְכֶ֑ם <WH3824> to yourselves that your heart וְסַרְתֶּ֗ם <WH5493> and ye turn aside וַעֲבַדְתֶּם֙ <WH5647> and serve אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <WH312> other וְהִשְׁתַּחֲוִיתֶ֖ם <WH7812> and worship לָהֶֽם׃

וְחָרָ֨ה <WH2734> be kindled אַף־ <WH639> wrath יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And [then] the LORD'S בָּכֶ֗ם וְעָצַ֤ר <WH6113> against you and he shut up אֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> the heaven וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> will be no יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become מָטָ֔ר <WH4306> that there be no rain וְהָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> and that the land לֹ֥א <WH3808> will be no תִתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> yield אֶת־ <WH853> יְבוּלָ֑הּ <WH2981> not her fruit וַאֲבַדְתֶּ֣ם <WH6> and [lest] ye perish מְהֵרָ֗ה <WH4120> quickly מֵעַל֙ <WH5921> and הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> land הַטֹּבָ֔ה <WH2896> from off the good אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> which the LORD נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> giveth לָכֶֽם׃

וְשַׂמְתֶּם֙ <WH7760> Therefore shall ye lay up אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבָרַ֣י <WH1697> these my words אֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these עַל־ <WH5921> on לְבַבְכֶ֖ם <WH3824> in your heart וְעַֽל־ <WH5921> and on נַפְשְׁכֶ֑ם <WH5315> and in your soul וּקְשַׁרְתֶּ֨ם <WH7194> and bind אֹתָ֤ם <WH853> לְאוֹת֙ <WH226> them for a sign עַל־ <WH5921> on יֶדְכֶ֔ם <WH3027> upon your hand וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> shall be as לְטוֹטָפֹ֖ת <WH2903> that they may be as frontlets בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between עֵינֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5869> between your eyes

וְלִמַּדְתֶּ֥ם <WH3925> And ye shall teach אֹתָ֛ם <WH853> אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1121> them your children לְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> speaking בָּ֑ם בְּשִׁבְתְּךָ֤ <WH3427> of them when thou sittest בְּבֵיתֶ֙ךָ֙ <WH1004> in thine house וּבְלֶכְתְּךָ֣ <WH1980> walk בַדֶּ֔רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way וּֽבְשָׁכְבְּךָ֖ <WH7901> when thou liest וּבְקוּמֶֽךָ׃ <WH6965> down and when thou risest up
וּכְתַבְתָּ֛ם <WH3789> And thou shalt write עַל־ <WH5921> on מְזוּז֥וֹת <WH4201> them upon the door posts בֵּיתֶ֖ךָ <WH1004> of thine house וּבִשְׁעָרֶֽיךָ׃ <WH8179> and upon thy gates

לְמַ֨עַן <WH4616> so יִרְבּ֤וּ <WH7235> may be multiplied יְמֵיכֶם֙ <WH3117> That your days וִימֵ֣י <WH3117> and the days בְנֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1121> of your children עַ֚ל <WH5921> above הָֽאֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> in the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּ֧ע <WH7650> sware יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> which the LORD לַאֲבֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1> unto your fathers לָתֵ֣ת <WH5414> to give לָהֶ֑ם כִּימֵ֥י <WH3117> them as the days הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> of heaven עַל־ <WH5921> above הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> upon the earth ס

כִּי֩ <WH3588> For אִם־ <WH518> if שָׁמֹ֨ר <WH8104> For if ye shall diligently תִּשְׁמְר֜וּן <WH8104> keep אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַמִּצְוָ֣ה <WH4687> all these commandments הַזֹּ֗את <WH2063> likewise אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֛י <WH595> I מְצַוֶּ֥ה <WH6680> which I command אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> לַעֲשֹׂתָ֑הּ <WH6213> you to do לְאַהֲבָ֞ה <WH157> them to love אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֛ם <WH430> your God לָלֶ֥כֶת <WH1980> to walk בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all דְּרָכָ֖יו <WH1870> in all his ways וּלְדָבְקָה־ <WH1692> and to cleave בֽוֹ׃

וְהוֹרִ֧ישׁ <WH3423> drive out יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Then will the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִ֥ם <WH1471> all these nations הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these מִלִּפְנֵיכֶ֑ם <WH6440> from before וִֽירִשְׁתֶּ֣ם <WH3423> you and ye shall possess גּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> nations גְּדֹלִ֥ים <WH1419> greater וַעֲצֻמִ֖ים <WH6099> and mightier מִכֶּֽם׃ <WH4480> than

כָּל־ <WH3605> Every הַמָּק֗וֹם <WH4725> Every place אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which תִּדְרֹ֧ךְ <WH1869> shall tread כַּֽף־ <WH3709> whereon the soles רַגְלְכֶ֛ם <WH7272> of your feet בּ֖וֹ לָכֶ֣ם יִהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> become מִן־ <WH4480> will be from הַמִּדְבָּ֨ר <WH4057> shall be yours from the wilderness וְהַלְּבָנ֜וֹן <WH3844> and Lebanon מִן־ <WH4480> at הַנָּהָ֣ר <WH5104> from the river נְהַר־ <WH5104> the river פְּרָ֗ת <WH6578> Euphrates וְעַד֙ <WH5704> far הַיָּ֣ם <WH3220> sea הָֽאַחֲר֔וֹן <WH314> even unto the uttermost יִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> shall be yours גְּבֻלְכֶֽם׃ <WH1366> shall your coast

לֹא־ <WH3808> No יִתְיַצֵּ֥ב <WH3320> be able to stand אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> There shall no man בִּפְנֵיכֶ֑ם <WH6440> before פַּחְדְּכֶ֨ם <WH6343> the fear וּמֽוֹרַאֲכֶ֜ם <WH4172> of you and the dread יִתֵּ֣ן ׀ <WH5414> shall lay יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> you [for] the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֗ם <WH430> your God עַל־ <WH5921> and פְּנֵ֤י <WH6440> of you upon כָל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> all the land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which תִּדְרְכוּ־ <WH1869> that ye shall tread בָ֔הּ כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> upon as he hath said לָכֶֽם׃ ס
רְאֵ֗ה <WH7200> Behold אָנֹכִ֛י <WH595> I נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> I set לִפְנֵיכֶ֖ם <WH6440> before הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> you this day בְּרָכָ֖ה <WH1293> a blessing וּקְלָלָֽה׃ <WH7045> and a curse

אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַבְּרָכָ֑ה <WH1293> A blessing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> if תִּשְׁמְע֗וּ <WH8085> if ye obey אֶל־ <WH413> to מִצְוֹת֙ <WH4687> the commandments יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> your God אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֛י <WH595> I מְצַוֶּ֥ה <WH6680> which I command אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> you this day

וְהַקְּלָלָ֗ה <WH7045> And a curse אִם־ <WH518> if לֹ֤א <WH3808> not תִשְׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> if ye will not obey אֶל־ <WH413> to מִצְוֹת֙ <WH4687> the commandments יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> your God וְסַרְתֶּ֣ם <WH5493> but turn aside מִן־ <WH4480> from הַדֶּ֔רֶךְ <WH1870> out of the way אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֛י <WH595> I מְצַוֶּ֥ה <WH6680> which I command אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> you this day לָלֶ֗כֶת <WH1980> along אַחֲרֵ֛י <WH310> after אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֖ים <WH312> other אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not יְדַעְתֶּֽם׃ <WH3045> which ye have not known ס

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> shall come כִּ֤י <WH3588> when יְבִֽיאֲךָ֙ <WH935> hath brought thee in יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> And it shall come to pass when the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God אֶל־ <WH413> into הָאָ֕רֶץ <WH776> unto the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you בָא־ <WH935> whither thou goest שָׁ֖מָּה <WH8033> in it לְרִשְׁתָּ֑הּ <WH3423> to possess וְנָתַתָּ֤ה <WH5414> it that thou shalt put אֶת־ <WH853> הַבְּרָכָה֙ <WH1293> the blessing עַל־ <WH5921> on הַ֣ר <WH2022> upon mount גְּרִזִ֔ים <WH1630> Gerizim וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַקְּלָלָ֖ה <WH7045> and the curse עַל־ <WH5921> on הַ֥ר <WH2022> upon mount עֵיבָֽל׃ <WH5858> Ebal

הֲלֹא־ <WH3808> not הֵ֜מָּה <WH1992> like בְּעֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> [Are] they not on the other side הַיַּרְדֵּ֗ן <WH3383> Jordan אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> by דֶּ֚רֶךְ <WH1870> the way מְב֣וֹא <WH3996> goeth down הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH8121> where the sun בְּאֶ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> in the land הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֔י <WH3669> of the Canaanites הַיֹּשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> which dwell בָּעֲרָבָ֑ה <WH6160> in the champaign מ֚וּל <WH4136> over against הַגִּלְגָּ֔ל <WH1537> Gilgal אֵ֖צֶל <WH681> beside אֵלוֹנֵ֥י <WH436> the plains מֹרֶֽה׃ <WH4176> Moreh

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אַתֶּם֙ <WH859> you עֹבְרִ֣ים <WH5674> For ye shall pass over אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> Jordan לָבֹא֙ <WH935> to go in לָרֶ֣שֶׁת <WH3423> to possess אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <WH430> your God נֹתֵ֣ן <WH5414> giveth לָכֶ֑ם וִֽירִשְׁתֶּ֥ם <WH3423> you and ye shall possess אֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> וִֽישַׁבְתֶּם־ <WH3427> it and dwell בָּֽהּ׃

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֣ם <WH8104> And ye shall observe לַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <WH6213> to do אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַֽחֻקִּ֖ים <WH2706> all the statutes וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֑ים <WH4941> and judgments אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֛י <WH595> I נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> which I set לִפְנֵיכֶ֖ם <WH6440> before הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> you this day
